sentences.sContent: It was no worse, she said, on his birthday or the anniversary of his death – it was a constant, daily, gnawing sense of loss.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was no worse, she said, on his birthday or the anniversary of his death – it was a constant, daily, gnawing sense of loss.
sentences.sCn: 她说，在他的生日或者忌日并不会更难过，这种痛苦是持续的，每天你都感觉到失去他的刻骨的痛。

trans.tranCn: 咬, 苛责, 不断的苦痛
